descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 9 custom color male argonians.
All are fully recruitable and marriable.
Currently all prefer meele combat.

You can find them at the following locations:
Red: Whiterun\'s The Drunken Huntsman.
Yellow: Ivarstead\'s Vilemyr Inn.
Blue: Morthal\'s Moorside Inn.
Green: Markarth\'s Silver-Blood Inn.
Purple: Solitude\'s The Winking Skeever.
Orange: Riverwood\'s The Sleeping Giant Inn.
Pink: DragonBridge\'s Four Shield Tavern.
White: Winterhold\'s The Frozen Hearth.
Black: Falkreath\'s Dead Man\'s Drink.

How to install:
Put Meshes, Textures and the .ESP file in your Skyrim Data Folder.

This Mod is completely functional, it shouldn\'t have issues alone.
Not sure if it will work with face change mods, body mods that doesn\'t affect face work fine.
author: HeroicWerewolf
